TopicTitle: Kerbal engineer 1.1.1 causes UI flickering in 1.1.2

Articles.Content:
So I updated to 1.1.2, and installed KER a bit later, and then I noticed in the VAB, contracts screen, map view, etc, the UI (like the part menus, contracts window, etc) flickers a lot, in some cases to the point of being unusable... removing KER solved this.

my other mods are OPM, and thats its...
